M

m - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This field is an int that assigns a number of moves that the Shield object will be active for after being enabled.
m - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player
This field represents the turns remaining on shield use as an int
Main - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse
This class gives the program a starting point.
Main() - Constructor for class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Main
The main class which creates GameEngine and calls GameEngine.startGame()
main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test.Test_Main
 
mainMenu() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.UserInterface
This method will print the main menu of the game to the user and give options such as, "continue" or "new game".
mainMenuSelect() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This method is called after UserInterface.mainMenu() prints the menu.
missionFailed() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.UserInterface
This method prints whenever the Player loses.
moveEnemy(Grid) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Enemy
This method will move the enemy in a random direction based on the int returned when roll(int) is called.
moveEnemy(Grid, Player) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This method will move the Enemy object on the Grid while also checking to see if a Player needs to be stabbed.
movementTest_Basic() - Static method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test.Test_Main
tested movement of player by printing out player position in the grid
movePlayer(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player
This method will move the player based on user input, which is passed as a String and forced to lower case.
movePlayer(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test.PlayerControl
This method will move the player based on user input
movePlayerForTurn() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This method will move the Player by calling Player.movePlayer(String) and Grid.rePopulateGrid(Player) .
movePlayerTest(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test.PlayerControl
 
moves - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This field is an int that tracks the Player's moves
moveTurn() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.UserInterface
This method simply prints out the four cardinal directions that the user can move.
musicOn - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This field is a boolean that is true whenever the music is on
